description: This is the building I use for my liberal arts classes, and if you're lucky, you'll hear yodeling!

information.title: Peculiarities
information.content: Please note that room 223 (118) is on the first floor

description: It's home to the admissions office and campus ventures, and you can rent software. There are rarely any classes!
It's home to a veterinary school and a veterinary clinic, so you can meet some special animal friends..
It's a building with a lot of animal-related research, so it's a little hot in the summer, but the facilities are great!
It can get hot in the summer with all the windows, but it's a building that houses life science classes and research.
The central library of Konkuk University and its iconic landmark! The reading room was renovated in 2024.

information.title: 1st floor
information.content: Shinhan Bank, Startup Information Center, Data Room, KU Digital Lounge

description: A research and teaching center on the Global Campus, closely associated with the Department of Characteristic Chemistry
This building is mainly used by students majoring in art and design, and has a very artistic atmosphere!
This used to be a library, but now it's a place where language-related classes are held, including TOEIC and TOEFL classes

information.title: Remarks
information.content: Free over-the-phone English lessons at the language school (recommended)

description: This is where the law school and law library are located, except the timetable says it's closed!

information.title: 1st floor
information.content: Large Lecture Hall, Law Library, Disabled Rest Room, Global Lounge, International Office, Bookbindery

description: A museum dedicated to the history and culture of Konkuk University, offering a glimpse into the past and present of the campus
This is where the administrative work of the school is handled, and you'll go for issuing various certificates and academic inquiries

information.title: 1st floor
information.content: KB Kookmin Bank, Shinhan Bank, Certificate Issuance Service, Import Promotion Paper

description: The old Normal University building is old, but it's full of history and tradition.
This is where the College of Social Sciences is located, there are a lot of stairs, so it's a good workout, but it can be a little strenuous going up
This building is mainly used by business school students, and is also famous as the main setting for the webcomic 'Cheese in the Trap'!

information.title: 1st floor
information.content: CU, Restio, K-HUB, IT Service Center

description: The tallest building on campus, symbolizing the university's leap forward. Big events like commencement ceremonies are held here
Used by architecture students, it took its current location after leaving the Art and Design Building

information.title: 1st floor
information.content: Building materials, unmanned copy room, K-HUB, painting room

description: A building used by the Department of Real Estate and the Graduate School, called the 'Haebong' Real Estate Building after its donor
Old building, home to the College of Letters, built in the 1950s
A building that houses several student welfare facilities and club rooms, and is one of the centers of campus life

information.content: Restaurant, 1847, Certificate Issuance Service, University Job Plus Center, Konkuk Souvenirs, Konkuk University Post Office, Shinhan Bank Konkuk University Branch, CU

information.content: Engineering Education Innovation Center and Business Unit

description: One of the older buildings in the College of Engineering, it has an old feel to it, but still houses many classes

information.content: Building B is labeled as Ball B in the general lecture timetable, which may be mistaken for the basement floor.

description: Facing building A, building C is on the right
A state-of-the-art facility for the College of Engineering, the building features energy efficiency and green elements

information.content: Prime Hall, Lounge, Photocopier, KU Smart Factory

description: This building is mainly used by natural science-related departments, where research and experiments are actively conducted
A building that is home to creative research and teaching, and inspires students to challenge themselves

information.content: Drinks, cigarettes, vending machines, unmanned photocopier, reserve regiment.

description: A building where art-related classes and research take place, and where there is a lot of hand-making going on
A dormitory for international students, where you can experience different cultures and languages
This is where students live, and it's a cozy place to study and relax at the same time

information.title: Dream Hall
information.content: Reading room, Convenience store, Laundry, Stationery store, Cafe

description: A natural lake on campus, perfect for walking or relaxing
A bridge that crosses Lake Ilgam, one of the most scenic spots on campus
Home to the bull statue, one of the symbols of Konkuk University, which symbolizes the strength of the campus
A quiet shelter on campus, a great place to spend some time relaxing
A statue of Dr. Sanghuh Yoo Seok-chang, the founder of Konkuk University, located in front of the library
A space where various events and performances are held, where you can feel the passion of the students
A place to play sports or host large events like festivals, with a newly renovated turf field

information.content: Application method: school homepage, application period: up to 1 month before ~ on the day, rental time: 09 ~ 22 hours

description: Home to a variety of indoor sports and events, it's a great place to work out
One of the main entrances to the building, named the back gate, but now it also serves as the front gate

The entrance to the library, one of the most used entrances
